986050.name: Mist Hunter Demo
986050.description:
Mist Hunter - is a blistering fast, rogue-lite action FPS set in world corrupted by a powerful magic force - the Mist. Unusual magic weapons, dozens of trophies that change the play style, procedural levels with authored touch, and several, completely different modes to put your skills to test.

Unabashed, young Mist Hunter has go deep into the Nexus
to solve its mystery and, probably, save the universe from the second coming of the Immortal Warlock R'axa.
986050.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
